DOC.detailed_description: The Pentacam Classic ( Oculus Optikgerate GmbH , Heidelberg , Germany , software version 1.14r04 ) use sake study.Two study group form : 1 ) Keratoconus group ( KC ) include patient progressive keratoconus 2 ) Collagen-Cross-linking group ( CXL ) include keratoconus patient treat uneventful CXL least year prior enrollment study . Three consecutive scan obtain two experienced operator . The procedure repeat within two week assessment intersession variability . In case acceptable map least 10.0mm corneal coverage.All back elevation point codify order facilitate statistical processing data . Further single point analysis , three additional parameter evaluate : ) zone 4 parameter ( z4 ) derive analysis point central 4.0mm diameter zone , b ) zone 8 parameter ( z8 ) derive analysis point central 8.0mm diameter zone , , c ) high elevation point parameter ( HEP ) , derive analysis high elevation point participant . Reproducibility measurement evaluate mean intraclass correlation coefficient ( ICC ) . Three different ICC type calculate : ) intrasession ICC operator ( ICC1 & ICC2 ) , b ) interobserver ICC , , c ) intersession ICC . Moreover , Bland-Altman plot use evaluate level agreement two operator .
